notes: Maksym Chernyak, 44-year-old Ukraine national, died in ICE custody. Died at HCA Kendall Hospital, Miami. Part of 2025 being deadliest year in ICE custody since 2004 (31+ deaths). 95% of ICE detention deaths could have been prevented with adequate medical care (PHR report).

outcome: Death during transport from jail to detention center
notes: EXHAUSTIVE: Major discrepancies: TransCor told 911 'medical department cleared him for travel, no noticeable medical conditions.' Yet EMS records showed stroke-level blood pressure. Acting ICE director Todd Lyons said 'We have nothing to hide' but official death report omits cause of death or medical detail. Family said he had no prior health conditions. Senators Warnock and Ossoff demanded answers. Arrested April 9, 2025 by Echols County Sheriff for probation violation.

ICE reported cause as liver and kidney failure. Facility violated at least 60 federal standards during its first 50 days of operation.

Border Patrol agents spotted several people in camouflage walking north from border. During apprehension, physical altercation ensued. Agent reported being in fight and needing help. Three gunshot wounds inflicted. Occurred during suspected narcotics smuggling operation. Texas Rangers investigating.

Preliminary cause of death reported as 'asphyxia due to neck and chest compression,' suggesting homicide ruling pending toxicology results.

January 2026: Parady La, 46-year-old Cambodian refugee, died from drug withdrawal in ICE detention in Philadelphia. La's family accused ICE of medical neglect, saying they were told he was begging for help in the final hours of his life.

Heber Sanchez Dominguez, unknown age-year-old Mexico national, died in ICE custody at Robert A. Deyton Detention Center. Cause: found hanging unresponsive. Part of 2025 being deadliest year in ICE custody since 2004 (31+ deaths). 95% of ICE detention deaths could have been prevented with adequate medical care (PHR report).

Renee Nicole Good, 37-year-old unknown nationality national, died in ICE custody at unknown facility. Part of 2025 being deadliest year in ICE custody since 2004 (31+ deaths). 95% of ICE detention deaths could have been prevented with adequate medical care (PHR report).

Alex Pretti, 37-year-old unknown nationality national, died in ICE custody at unknown facility. Part of 2025 being deadliest year in ICE custody since 2004 (31+ deaths). 95% of ICE detention deaths could have been prevented with adequate medical care (PHR report).

Genry Donaldo Ruiz-Guillen, 29-year-old Honduran national, died at Larkin Community Hospital after being detained at Krome. Suffered from rhabdomyolysis (muscle breakdown leading to kidney failure). Had been hospitalized since Dec 9, 2024. Mother said he complained of fainting spells in his last call. Part of pattern of deaths at Krome facility.

Serawit Gezahegn Dejene, 45-year-old Ethiopian national, died at Banner University Medical Center. Death related to untreated HIV - experts said routine blood tests would have immediately shown HIV and death was 'entirely preventable'. Hospitalized since Dec 23, 2024. Eloy Detention Center has at least 16 reported deaths including 5 suicides.

Dead within 18 hours of being placed in detention. Medical professionals said it would be 'highly unusual' for someone with liver failure not to show symptoms 18 hours before death. NY Attorney General investigating.
Scheduled for deportation on December 13, the day before his death was officially pronounced. Found without pulse on December 4.

Shot at close range after dropping children off at school. Bullet traveled through back of neck to chest. Cook County Medical Examiner ruled homicide. Single father of two boys (ages 6 and 3). No criminal history - only traffic violations. Bodycam footage contradicts DHS claims he dragged agents. Mexican President called for investigation. Body repatriated to Michoacan.

outcome: Death 10 days after detention, family not notified until deathbed
notes: EXHAUSTIVE: Second Adelanto death in 2025 (after Ayala-Uribe). ICE missed deadline to release death report. ICE stopped paying outside medical providers since October 3, 2025 - 'no mechanism to provide prescribed medication' or 'pay for medically necessary off-site care.' No dialysis, prenatal care, oncology, chemotherapy. Population ballooned from <40,000 in January to 73,000+.
source_name: KVCR News / LA Taco / CBS Los Angeles

notes: Josue Castro Rivera, 24-year-old Honduras national. Was heading to gardening job when vehicle pulled over by ICE on I-264. Was in vehicle with 3 others. Fled onto busy highway when agents began detaining occupants. Struck by Ford pickup truck. ICE did NOT have a removal order for him. Had no criminal record. Had been in US 4 years.

Jaime Alanis Garcia, 57-year-old Mexico national. First known death during Trump ICE raid. Fell 30 feet from Glass House Farms cannabis greenhouse roof while hiding/fleeing. Broke neck, died after 3 days on life support. DHS says he was not "pursued" but family says he was hiding. ~200 arrested in raid, 10 minors found. GoFundMe raised 50k+.

Felix Baukholt, German national on expired H1B visa. Traffic stop for immigration inspection. Female companion Teresa Youngblut opened fire "without warning," killing both Baukholt and Border Patrol Agent David Maland. Couple had been observed in tactical gear at hotels.

Keith Porter, 43-year-old US citizen and African-American father of two. Shot on New Year's Eve by off-duty ICE agent Brian Palacios. DHS claims Porter was firing celebratory shots with rifle and pointed weapon at agent. Family disputes account. No charges filed against agent.

Lawful Permanent Resident. Hospitalized for fever, died the next day. Krome facility had 5 medical violations and 14 total violations including overcrowding with people sleeping on floors. | October 11, 2025: Hasan Ali Moh'D Saleh, a lawful permanent resident, died after being transferred to Krome on September 14, 2025. On October 10, he was transported to Larkin Community Hospital due to fever; the next day he was dead.

January 3, 2026: 55-year-old Cuban man died in ICE detention at Camp East Montana. ICE initially said his death was a suicide, but a witness stated he was choked by a guard. Subsequently, the medical examiner ruled the death a homicide.
